snippet.title: River City Girls 2 - Official Villains Trailer
snippet.description:
Renowned developer WayForward and ArcSystemWorks introduce you to the villains of River City Girls 2,  including Sabuko (the "disgraced daughter"), Ken (the "rich boy yakuza"), and Sabu (the "criminal patriarch). River City Girls 2 is the upcoming pixel-art side-scrolling beat-'em-up sequel that's coming soon to Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation, and Xbox platforms. Stay tuned to the end of the trailer for a gameplay feature surprise!

#IGN #Gaming
